rows.label: qst001801_msg0001
rows.name: Thank you. You saved me.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0002
rows.name:
My name is Olua. As you
can see, I'm a Blade. It's
a pleasure to meet you.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0003
rows.name: What should we say?

rows.label: qst001801_msg0004
rows.name: Ask her to join us.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0005
rows.name: Ask what happened to her Driver.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0006
rows.name: I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0007
rows.name:
Even if it's a request from my
saviors, I'm afraid I can't.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0008
rows.name: I have a wonderful Driver named Romney.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0009
rows.name: You're very perceptive.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0010
rows.name: A boy named Romney is my Driver.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0011
rows.name:
He's still a fledgling Driver,
not as strong as you all.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0012
rows.name:
He can barely even swing
a sword properly.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0013
rows.name:
That's why we always choose
to run instead of fight.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0014
rows.name:
But a Moks Eluca blew him
away from behind, and he
fell into the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0015
rows.name: Don't you worry. He'll surely be fine.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0016
rows.name:
The fact that I'm still here
means he's still alive.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0017
rows.name:
No, that's... It would be a
lie to say I'm not worried.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0018
rows.name:
If it's not too much to ask,
could you look for Romney?

rows.label: qst001801_msg0019
rows.name:
Even if he's safe now, if a
monster attacks him while I'm
not there, he'll be helpless.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0020
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0021
rows.name:
There's a chance Romney might come
back on his own, so I'll wait here.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0101
rows.name:
Romney fell into the Cloud Sea
from here, so he must be somewhere
below this island, right?

rows.label: qst001801_msg0102
rows.name:
I hope he managed to reach an
island facing the Cloud Sea...

rows.label: qst001801_msg0103
rows.name:
Oh, and... Romney is a
Superbian boy. Good luck.

rows.label: qst001801_msg0201
rows.name: Help!

rows.label: qst001801_msg0202
rows.name: Please, defeat the Moks Elucas!
